    [FinTech_LedgerService] --> idle

    ready --> ready : LOAD
    simulating --> ready : LOAD
    ready --> simulating : START [FinTech_FraudDetection]
    simulating --> simulating : DISPATCH
    simulating --> simulating : SET_CONTEXT
    simulating --> simulating : REFRESH
    simulating --> simulating : EVAL_GATES
    simulating --> simulating : FORK
    simulating --> simulating : SWITCH_FORK [FinTech_FraudDetection]
    simulating --> simulating : STEP_BACK [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    simulating --> simulating : SET_SEQUENCE
    simulating --> simulating : RUN_SEQUENCE [FinTech_AuthVault]
    simulating --> simulating : FUZZ
    simulating --> simulating : FIND_PATH
    simulating --> simulating : EXPLORE
    simulating --> simulating : VIEW_TRACE
    simulating --> simulating : VIEW_SPACE [FinTech_FraudDetection]
    simulating --> simulating : EXPORT [FinTech_FraudDetection]
    simulating --> simulating : IMPORT [FinTech_LedgerService]
    simulating --> simulating : RESET
    simulating --> ready : STOP
    ready --> idle : UNLOAD
    simulating --> idle : UNLOAD

extra.repo_description: L++ is not a programming language. It is a language-agnostic Logic Frame designed to execute business processes defined in purely symbolic, declarative blueprints.
